title: Free PS4 PlayStation Plus Games For January 2020 Revealed
description: The free PS Plus games for January 2020 have been announced. PS4 players can start the new year off right with Uncharted: The Nathan Drake Collection, which includes the first three games in the series: Drake's Fortune, Among Thieves, and Drake's Deception. PS4's other free January game is Goat Simulator.

title: Grand Theft Auto V Comes To Xbox Game Pass | GameSpot Live
description: GTA V has officially come to Xbox Game Pass which means we absolutely had to boot it up and relive the 2013 magic that has never ended in San Andreas.

title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare Grind Mode | GameSpot Live
description: Modern Warfare introduces a new, but familiar, game mode to the multiplayer experience. Grind is a fast-paced mix between Kill Confirmed and Hardpoint but will require some serious strategy to succeed. GameSpot Live tries to Grind their way to victory to kick off the New Year!
